column5: ON THE LAKE!! Large bdrm w/private bath across the hall.Walk out to common deck from your bdrm and down the stairs to fish, swim & kayak off our dock.KAYAK IS FREE! Great view in the trees with a Texas BNB ambiance. Texas wineries & live music near by. Market, coffee shop, massage, and restaurants all across RR620. Downtown average 30 mins. away. Parks, trails, zipline, boat rentals and the Oasis are close by.The kitchen and grills are yours to use. Parking, washer/dryer, and more.
column8: WATERFRONT ON LAKE TRAVIS!!! Kayak, fish, & swim!
